yohana:16:27: 27.kuko Data na we abakunda ubwe kuko mwankunze mukizera yuko navuye ku Mana.
yohana:16:28: 28.Navuye kuri Data nza mu isi, kandi isi ndayivamo nsubire kuri Data.”
yohana:16:29: 29.Abigishwa baravuga bati “Dore noneho ureruye, nta mugani uduciriye.
yohana:16:30: 30.Ubu tuzi yuko uzi byose kandi ko utagomba ko umuntu wese agira icyo akubaza, ni cyo gituma twizera ko wavuye ku Mana.”
yohana:16:31: 31.Yesu arabasubiza ati “None murizeye?
yohana:16:32: 32.Dore igihe kirenda gusohora ndetse kirasohoye, ubwo muri butatane umuntu wese ukwe, mukansiga jyenyine. Ariko sindi jyenyine, kuko Data ari kumwe nanjye.
yohana:16:33: 33.Ibyo mbibabwiriye kugira ngo mugire amahoro muri jye. Mu isi mugira umubabaro, ariko nimuhumure nanesheje isi.”
yohana:17:1: Yesu asabira abigishwa be n’abandi bose bazamwizera1.Yesu amaze kuvuga ibyo, yubura amaso areba mu ijuru ati “Data, igihe kirasohoye, ubahiriza Umwana wawe ngo Umwana akubahishe,
yohana:17:2: 2.nk’uko wamuhaye ubutware ku bantu bose, kugira ngo abo wamuhaye bose abahe ubugingo buhoraho.
yohana:17:3: 3.Ubu ni bwo bugingo buhoraho, ko bakumenya ko ari wowe Mana y’ukuri yonyine, bakamenya n’uwo watumye ari we Yesu Kristo.
yohana:17:4: 4.Nakubahishije mu isi, kuko narangije umurimo wampaye gukora.
yohana:17:5: 5.Na none Data, imbere yawe unyubahirishe cya cyubahiro nahoranye ndi kumwe nawe isi itararemwa.
yohana:17:6: 6.“Abo wampaye mu isi mbamenyesheje izina ryawe. Bari abawe urabampa, none dore bitondeye ijambo ryawe.
yohana:17:7: 7.None bamenye yuko ibyo wampaye byose byaturutse kuri wowe,
yohana:17:8: 8.kuko amagambo wampaye nayabahaye na bo bakayemera, bakamenya by’ukuri ko naturutse kuri wowe, bakizera kandi ko ari wowe wantumye.
yohana:17:9: 9.“Ndabasabira. Sinsabira ab’isi, ahubwo ndasabira abo wampaye kuko ari abawe,
yohana:17:10: 10.kandi ibyanjye byose ni ibyawe, n’ibyawe na byo ni ibyanjye kandi nubahirijwe muri bo.
yohana:17:11: 11.Jye sinkiri mu isi ariko bo bari mu isi, naho jye ndaza kuri wowe. Data Wera, ubarindire mu izina ryawe wampaye, ngo babe umwe nk’uko natwe turi umwe.
yohana:17:12: 12.Nkiri kumwe na bo, nabarindiraga mu izina ryawe wampaye. Narabarinze, muri bo nta muntu wabuze ngo arimbuke, keretse umwana wo kurimbuka ngo ibyanditswe bisohore.
yohana:17:13: 13.Ariko none ndaza kuri wowe, kandi ibyo mbivuze nkiri mu isi, ngo bagire umunezero wanjye wuzure muri bo.
yohana:17:14: 14.Nabahaye ijambo ryawe, kandi ab’isi barabanga kuko atari ab’isi, nk’uko nanjye ntari uw’isi.
yohana:17:15: 15.Sinsaba ko ubakura mu isi, ahubwo ubarinde Umubi.
yohana:17:16: 16.Si ab’isi nk’uko nanjye ntari uw’isi.
yohana:17:17: 17.Ubereshe ukuri: ijambo ryawe ni ryo kuri.
yohana:17:18: 18.Uko wantumye mu isi nanjye ni ko nabatumye mu isi,
yohana:17:19: 19.kandi nanjye niyeza ku bwabo ngo na bo babe bereshejwe ukuri.
yohana:17:20: 20.“Sinsabira aba bonyine, ahubwo ndasabira n’abazanyizezwa n’ijambo ryabo,
yohana:17:21: 21.ngo bose babe umwe nk’uko uri muri jye, Data, nanjye nkaba muri wowe ngo na bo babe umwe muri twe, ngo ab’isi bizere ko ari wowe wantumye.
yohana:17:22: 22.Nanjye mbahaye ubwiza wampaye, ngo babe umwe nk’uko natwe turi umwe.
yohana:17:23: 23.Jyewe mbe muri bo nawe ube muri jye, ngo babe umwe rwose, ngo ab’isi bamenye ko ari wowe wantumye, ukabakunda nk’uko wankunze.
yohana:17:24: 24.“Data, abo wampaye ndashaka ko aho ndi na bo bahabana nanjye, ngo babone ubwiza bwanjye wampaye, kuko wankunze isi itararemwa.
yohana:17:25: 25.Data ukiranuka, ab’isi ntibakumenye ariko jyewe narakumenye, n’aba na bo bamenye ko ari wowe wantumye.
yohana:17:26: 26.Nabamenyesheje izina ryawe kandi nzaribamenyesha, ngo urukundo wankunze rube muri bo, nanjye mbe muri bo.”
yohana:18:1: Bafata Yesu (Mat 26.36,47-56; Mar 14.43-50; Luka 22.47-53)1.Yesu amaze kuvuga ayo magambo asohokana n’abigishwa be, yambuka umugezi witwa Kidironi, hariho agashyamba akajyanamo n’abigishwa be.
yohana:18:2: 2.Kandi na Yuda umugambanira na we yari azi aho hantu, kuko Yesu yahajyanaga n’abigishwa be kenshi.
yohana:18:3: 3.Nuko Yuda amaze guhabwa ingabo z’abasirikare n’abagaragu b’abatambyi bakuru n’ab’Abafarisayo, ajyayo afite amatabaza n’imuri n’intwaro.
yohana:18:4: 4.Yesu amenye ibyenda kumubaho byose, arabasanganira arababaza ati “Murashaka nde?”
yohana:18:5: 5.Baramusubiza bati “Ni Yesu w’i Nazareti.” Arababwira ati “Ni jye.” Na Yuda umugambanira yari ahagararanye na bo.
yohana:18:6: 6.Amaze kubabwira ati “Ni jye”, bagenza imigongo bagwa hasi.
yohana:18:7: 7.Nuko yongera kubabaza ati “Murashaka nde?” Bati “Ni Yesu w’i Nazareti.”
yohana:18:8: 8.Yesu arabasubiza ati “Mbabwiye ko ari jye. Nuko rero niba ari jye mushaka mureke aba bagende.”
yohana:18:9: 9.Yabivugiye atyo kugira ngo rya jambo yavuze risohore, ngo “Mu bo wampaye sinabuzeho n’umwe.”
yohana:18:10: 10.Nuko Simoni Petero yari afite inkota, arayikura ayikubita umugaragu w’umutambyi mukuru amuca ugutwi kw’iburyo. Uwo mugaragu yitwaga Maluko.
yohana:18:11: 11.Nuko Yesu abwira Petero ati “Subiza inkota mu rwubati rwayo, mbese igikombe Data ampaye ne kukinyweraho?”
yohana:18:12: Yesu aregerwa imbere ya Kayafa, Petero amwihakana gatatu (Mat 26.57-75; Mar 14.55-72; Luka 22.54-71)12.Nuko izo ngabo n’umutware wazo n’abagaragu b’Abayuda bafata Yesu baramuboha,
yohana:18:13: 13.babanza kumujyana kwa Ana kuko yari sebukwe wa Kayafa, wari umutambyi mukuru muri uwo mwaka.
yohana:18:14: 14.Kandi Kayafa ni we wagiriye Abayuda inama ati “Birakwiriye ko umuntu umwe apfira abantu.”
yohana:18:15: 15.Simoni Petero n’undi mwigishwa bakurikira Yesu. Uwo mwigishwa yari azwi n’umutambyi mukuru, yinjirana na Yesu mu rugo rw’umutambyi mukuru.
yohana:18:16: 16.Ariko Petero yari ahagaze hanze ku irembo. Wa mwigishwa wundi wari uzwi n’umutambyi mukuru, arasohoka avugana n’umuja ukumira, nuko yinjiza Petero.
yohana:18:17: 17.Uwo muja ukumira abaza Petero ati “Mbese aho nawe nturi uwo mu bigishwa b’uriya muntu?” Aramusubiza ati “Oya, sindi umwigishwa we.”
yohana:18:18: 18.Abagaragu n’abasirikare bari bahagaze aho, bacanye umuriro w’amakara kuko hari imbeho barota, na Petero na we yari kumwe na bo ahagaze yota.
yohana:18:19: 19.Nuko umutambyi mukuru abaza Yesu iby’abigishwa be n’ibyo yigishaga.
yohana:18:20: 20.Yesu aramusubiza ati “Nigishaga ab’isi neruye, iteka nigishiriza mu masinagogi no mu rusengero aho Abayuda bose bateranira, nta cyo navuze rwihishwa.
yohana:18:21: 21.Urambariza iki? Abumvaga ba ari bo ubaza ibyo nababwiye, ni bo bazi ibyo navuze.”
yohana:18:22: 22.Amaze kuvuga atyo, umwe mu basirikare wari uhagaze aho akubita Yesu urushyi ati “Uku ni ko usubiza umutambyi mukuru?”
yohana:18:23: 23.Yesu aramusubiza ati “Niba mvuze ikibi kimpamye. Ariko niba ari neza umpoye iki?”
yohana:18:24: 24.Nuko Ana amwohereza ari imbohe kuri Kayafa, umutambyi mukuru.
yohana:18:25: 25.Ubwo Simoni Petero yari ahagaze yota. Baramubaza bati “Mbese nawe nturi uwo mu bigishwa be?” Arabihakana ati “Oya, sindi uwo muri bo.”
yohana:18:26: 26.Umwe mu bagaragu b’umutambyi mukuru, mwene wabo w’uwo Petero yaciye ugutwi aramubaza ati “Harya sinakubonye uri kumwe na we muri ka gashyamba?”
yohana:18:27: 27.Petero yongera kubihakana, muri ako kanya inkoko irabika.
yohana:18:28: Yesu bamujyana kwa Pilato (Mat 27.1-2,11-31; Mar 15.1-15; Luka 23.1-5,13-25)28.Bavana Yesu kwa Kayafa bamujyana mu rukiko, hari mu museke. Ubwabo ntibinjira mu rukiko ngo batihumanya, bakabura uko barya ibya Pasika.
yohana:18:29: 29.Nuko Pilato arasohoka ajya aho bari ati “Uyu muntu muramurega iki?”
yohana:18:30: 30.Baramusubiza bati “Uyu iyaba atakoze icyaha ntituba tumukuzaniye.”
yohana:18:31: 31.Pilato arababwira ati “Nimumujyane, abe ari mwe mumucira urubanza nk’uko amategeko yanyu ari.” Abayuda baramubwira bati “Twebwe ntitwemererwa kwica umuntu”,
yohana:18:32: 32.ngo ijambo rya Yesu risohore, iryo yavuze rimenyesha urupfu agiye gupfa.
yohana:18:33: 33.Pilato yongera kwinjira mu rukiko, ahamagara Yesu aramubaza ati “Wowe uri umwami w’Abayuda?”
yohana:18:34: 34.Yesu na we aramubaza ati “Mbese ibyo ubibajije ku bwawe, cyangwa se ni abandi bakubwiye ibyanjye?”
yohana:18:35: 35.Pilato aramusubiza ati “Uragira ngo ndi Umuyuda? Ab’ubwoko bwanyu n’abatambyi bakuru ni bo bakunzaniye. Wakoze iki?”
yohana:18:36: 36.Yesu aramusubiza ati “Ubwami bwanjye si ubw’iyi si, iyaba ubwami bwanjye bwari ubw’iyi si, abagaragu banjye baba barwanye ngo ntahabwa Abayuda, ariko noneho ubwami bwanjye si ubw’ino.”
yohana:18:37: 37.Pilato aramubaza ati “Noneho ga uri umwami?” Yesu aramusubiza ati “Wakabimenye ko ndi umwami. Iki ni cyo navukiye kandi ni cyo cyanzanye mu isi: ni ukugira ngo mpamye ukuri, uw’ukuri wese yumva ijwi ryanjye.”
yohana:18:38: 38.Pilato aramubaza ati “Ukuri ni iki?” Amaze kubivuga atyo aherako arasohoka, ajya aho Abayuda bari bari arababwira ati “Jyewe nta cyaha mubonyeho.
yohana:18:39: 39.Icyakora mufite umugenzo ko mbabohorera imbohe imwe mu minsi ya Pasika. Mbese murashaka ko mbabohorera umwami w’Abayuda?”
yohana:18:40: 40.Ariko bongera gusakuza bati “Si we dushaka, ahubwo utubohorere Baraba.” Baraba uwo yari umwambuzi.
yohana:19:1: Pilato acira Yesu urubanza1.Nuko Pilato aherako ajyana Yesu, amukubita imikoba.
yohana:19:2: 2.Abasirikare baboha ikamba ry’amahwa barimwambika mu mutwe, bamwambika n’umwenda w’umuhengeri.
yohana:19:3: 3.Baramwegera baramubwira bati “Ni amahoro, Mwami w’Abayuda!” Bamukubita inshyi.
yohana:19:4: 4.Pilato yongera gusohoka arababwira ati “Dore ndamusohoye, ndamubazaniye ngo mumenye yuko ari nta cyaha mubonyeho.”
yohana:19:5: 5.Nuko Yesu asohoka yambaye ikamba ry’amahwa n’umwenda w’umuhengeri, Pilato arababwira ati “Uwo muntu nguyu!”
yohana:19:6: 6.Abatambyi bakuru n’abasirikare bamubonye batera hejuru bati “Mubambe! Mubambe!” Pilato arababwira ati “Mube ari mwe mumujyana mumubambe, kuko jyewe ntamubonyeho icyaha.”
yohana:19:7: 7.Abayuda baramusubiza bati “Dufite itegeko, ku bw’iryo tegeko akwiriye gupfa kuko yigize Umwana w’Imana.”
yohana:19:8: 8.Pilato yumvise ibyo arushaho gutinya.
yohana:19:9: 9.Nuko yongera kwinjira mu rukiko maze abaza Yesu ati “Wavuye he?” Ariko Yesu ntiyagira icyo amusubiza.
yohana:19:10: 10.Pilato aramubaza ati “Uranyihorera? Ntuzi yuko mfite ububasha bwo kukurekura, kandi ko mfite ububasha bwo kukubamba?”
yohana:19:11: 11.Yesu aramusubiza ati “Ntiwagira ububasha bwo kugira icyo untwara utabuhawe buvuye mu ijuru, ni cyo gituma ukungabije akurusha icyaha.”
yohana:19:12: 12.Uhereye ubwo Pilato ashaka uburyo bwo kumurekura. Ariko Abayuda batera hejuru bati “Nurekura uyu uraba utari incuti ya Kayisari, kuko umuntu wese wigize umwami aba agomeye Kayisari.”
yohana:19:13: 13.Nuko Pilato yumvise ibyo asohora Yesu, yicara ku ntebe y’imanza ahantu hitwa Amabuye ashashwe, mu Ruheburayo hitwa Gabata.
yohana:19:14: 14.(Ubwo hari ku munsi wo kwitegura ibya Pasika, hari nk’isaha esheshatu.) Nuko abwira Abayuda ati “Nguyu umwami wanyu.”
yohana:19:15: 15.Na bo batera hejuru bati “Mukureho, mukureho umubambe!” Pilato arababaza ati “Mbese mbambe umwami wanyu?” Abatambyi bakuru baramusubiza bati “Nta mwami dufite keretse Kayisari.”
yohana:19:16: 16.Aherako aramubaha ngo abambwe.
yohana:19:17: Babamba Yesu (Mat 27.32-56; Mar 15.21-32; Luka 23.26-42) Nuko bajyana Yesu,17.asohoka yiyikorereye umusaraba agera ahantu hitwa i Nyabihanga, mu Ruheburayo hitwa i Gologota.
yohana:19:18: 18.Bamubambanaho n’abandi babiri hirya no hino, Yesu ari hagati.
yohana:19:19: 19.Pilato yandika urwandiko arushyira ku musaraba, rwanditswe ngo “YESU W’I NAZARETI, UMWAMI W’ABAYUDA.”
yohana:19:20: 20.Urwo rwandiko benshi mu Bayuda bararusoma, kuko ahantu babambye Yesu hari bugufi bw’umurwa, kandi rwari rwanditswe mu Ruheburayo, no mu Ruroma, no mu Rugiriki.
yohana:19:21: 21.Nuko Abatambyi bakuru b’Abayuda babwira Pilato bati “Ntiwandike ngo ‘Umwami w’Abayuda’, ahubwo wandike uti ‘Yiyise umwami w’Abayuda.’ ”
yohana:19:22: 22.Pilato arabasubiza ati “Icyo nanditse nacyanditse.”
yohana:19:23: 23.Nuko abasirikare bamaze kubamba Yesu, bajyana imyambaro ye bayigabanyamo kane, umusirikare wese umugabane we, ariko hasigara ikanzu ye. Iyo kanzu ntiyari ifite umubariro, ahubwo yari iboshywe yose uhereye hejuru ukageza hasi.
yohana:19:24: 24.Nuko baravugana bati “Twe kuyitanyagura, ahubwo tuyifindire turebe uri bube nyirayo uwo ari we.” Bavuze ibyo ngo ibyanditswe bisohore ngo “Bagabanye imyenda yanjye, Kandi bafindira umwambaro wanjye.” Nuko abasirikare babigenza batyo.
yohana:19:25: 25.Nyina wa Yesu na nyina wabo, na Mariya muka Kilopa na Mariya Magadalena, bari bahagaze ku musaraba wa Yesu.
yohana:19:26: 26.Nuko Yesu abonye nyina n’umwigishwa yakundaga ahagaze bugufi, abwira nyina ati “Mubyeyi, nguyu umwana wawe.”
yohana:19:27: 27.Maze abwira uwo mwigishwa ati “Nguyu nyoko.” Uhereye uwo mwanya uwo mwigishwa amujyana iwe.
yohana:19:28: Urupfu rwa Yesu (Mat 27.45-56; Mar 15.33-41; Luka 23.44-49)28.Hanyuma y’ibyo, Yesu amenye yuko noneho byose birangiye, agira ngo ibyanditswe bisohore rwose ni ko kuvuga ati “Mfite inyota.”
yohana:19:29: 29.Hari hateretse ikibindi cyuzuye vino isharira. Nuko benda sipongo yuzuye iyo vino isharira, bayishyira ku rubingo barayimusomesha.
yohana:19:30: 30.Yesu amaze gusoma iyo vino aravuga ati “Birarangiye.” Acurika umutwe, umutima uraca.
yohana:19:31: 31.Uwo munsi wari uwo kwitegura Pasika, kandi Abayuda ntibashakaga ko imibiri iguma ku musaraba ku isabato, kuko iyo sabato yari umunsi mukuru, ni ko gusaba Pilato kubavuna amaguru ngo babamburwe.
yohana:19:32: 32.Abasirikare baraza babanza kuri umwe bamuvuna amaguru, n’undi wari ubambanywe na we bamugenza batyo,
yohana:19:33: 33.ariko bageze kuri Yesu basanga amaze gupfa ntibamuvuna amaguru,
yohana:19:34: 34.ariko umwe muri bo amucumita icumu mu rubavu, uwo mwanya havamo amaraso n’amazi.
yohana:19:35: 35.Uwabibonye ni we ubihamije, kandi ibyo ahamya ni iby’ukuri, kandi azi ko avuga ukuri ngo namwe mwizere.
yohana:19:36: 36.Kuko ibyo byabereyeho kugira ngo ibyanditswe bisohore ngo “Nta gufwa rye rizavunwa.”
yohana:19:37: 37.Byongeye kandi ibindi byanditswe biravuga ngo “Bazabona uwo bacumise.”
yohana:19:38: Yosefu na Nikodemo bahamba Yesu (Mat 27.57-60; Mar 15.42-47; Luka 23.50-56)38.Hanyuma y’ibyo haza Yosefu wo mu Arimataya, na we yari umwigishwa wa Yesu ariko rwihishwa, kuko yatinyaga Abayuda. Uwo ajya kwa Pilato amwaka intumbi ya Yesu ngo ayikureho, Pilato aramwemerera, araza akuraho intumbi ya Yesu.
yohana:19:39: 39.Na Nikodemo wa wundi wigeze kumusanga nijoro cya gihe, araza azanye ishangi ivanze n’umusaga, kuremera kwayo kwari nk’ibiro mirongo itanu.
yohana:19:40: 40.Bajyana intumbi ya Yesu bayizingira mu myenda y’ibitare hamwe n’iyo mibavu, nk’uko Abayuda bagenzaga bahamba.
yohana:19:41: 41.Aho hantu yabambwe hari agashyamba, kandi muri ako gashyamba hari imva nshya itarahambwamo umuntu.
yohana:19:42: 42.Aho ni ho bahambye Yesu, kuko wari umunsi wo kwitegura kw’Abayuda, kandi iyo mva yari iri hafi.
yohana:20:1: Kuzuka kwa Yesu (Mat 28.1-10; Mar 16.1-8; Luka 24.1-12)1.Ku wa mbere w’iminsi irindwi, mu rubungabungo hatarabona Mariya Magadalena aza ku gituro, asanga igitare gikuwe ku gituro.
yohana:20:2: 2.Arirukanka asanga Simoni Petero na wa mwigishwa wundi Yesu yakundaga arababwira ati “Bakuye Umwami Yesu mu gituro, kandi ntituzi aho bamushyize.”
yohana:20:3: 3.Petero asohokana na wa mwigishwa wundi bajya ku gituro.
yohana:20:4: 4.Bombi birukira icyarimwe, ariko uwo mwigishwa asiga Petero aba ari we ubanza kugera ku gituro.
yohana:20:5: 5.Arunama arungurukamo, abona imyenda y’ibitare ishyizwe hasi ariko ntiyinjiramo.
yohana:20:6: 6.Maze Simoni Petero na we aza amukurikiye, yinjira mu gituro abona imyenda y’ibitare ishyizwe hasi,
yohana:20:7: 7.n’igitambaro cyari mu mutwe we kidashyizwe hamwe n’imyenda y’ibitare, ahubwo cyari kizinze kiri ukwacyo hirya.
yohana:20:8: 8.Ni cyo cyatumye na wa mwigishwa wundi wabanje kugera ku gituro na we yinjira. Abibonye yizera ibyo yabwiwe na wa mugore,
yohana:20:9: 9.kuko bari bataramenya ibyanditswe ko akwiriye kuzuka.
yohana:20:10: 10.Maze abigishwa basubirayo bajya iwabo.
yohana:20:11: Yesu yiyereka Mariya Magadalena (Mat 28.9-10; Mar 16.9-11)11.Ariko Mariya yari ahagaze ku gituro arira. Akirira arunama arunguruka mu gituro,
yohana:20:12: 12.abona abamarayika babiri bambaye imyenda yera bicaye, umwe ku musego n’undi ku mirambizo, aho intumbi ya Yesu yari yarashyizwe.
yohana:20:13: 13.Baramubaza bati “Mugore, urarizwa n’iki?” Arabasubiza ati “Ni uko bakuyemo Umwami wanjye, nanjye sinzi aho bamushyize.”
yohana:20:14: 14.Amaze kuvuga atyo arakebuka, abona Yesu ahagaze ariko ntiyamenya ko ari we.
yohana:20:15: 15.Yesu aramubaza ati “Mugore, urarizwa n’iki? Urashaka nde?” Yibwira ko ari umurinzi w’agashyamba aramubwira ati “Mutware, niba ari wowe umujyanye ahandi, mbwira aho umushyize nanjye mukureyo.”
yohana:20:16: 16.Yesu aramubwira ati “Mariya.” Arahindukira amwitaba mu Ruheburayo ati “Rabuni” (risobanurwa ngo “Databuja.”)
yohana:20:17: 17.Yesu aramubwira ati “Ntunkoreho kuko ntarazamuka ngo njye kwa Data, ahubwo jya kubwira bene Data yuko nzamutse ngiye kwa Data ari we So, kandi ku Mana yanjye ari yo Mana yanyu.”
yohana:20:18: 18.Mariya Magadalena aragenda, abarira abigishwa inkuru ati “Nabonye Umwami”, kandi abatekerereza ibyo yamubwiye.
yohana:20:19: Yesu yiyereka abigishwa be Toma adahari (Mat 28.16-20; Mar 16.14-18; Luka 24.36-49)19.Nuko kuri uwo munsi bugorobye, ari wo wa mbere w’iminsi irindwi, abigishwa bari bateraniye mu nzu, inzugi zikinze kuko batinyaga Abayuda. Yesu araza ahagarara hagati yabo arababwira ati “Amahoro abe muri mwe.”
yohana:20:20: 20.Amaze kuvuga atyo abereka ibiganza bye n’urubavu rwe. Abigishwa babonye Umwami baranezerwa.
yohana:20:21: 21.Yesu yongera kubabwira ati “Amahoro abe muri mwe. Uko Data yantumye ni ko nanjye mbatumye.”
yohana:20:22: 22.Amaze kuvuga atyo abahumekeraho ati “Nimwakire Umwuka Wera.
yohana:20:23: 23.Abo muzababarira ibyaha bose bazaba babibabariwe, abo mutazabibabarira bose bazaba batabibabariwe.”
yohana:20:24: 24.Ariko Toma umwe muri abo cumi na babiri witwaga Didumo, ntiyari kumwe na bo ubwo Yesu yazaga.
yohana:20:25: 25.Ni cyo cyatumye abandi bigishwa bamubwira bati “Tubonye Umwami!” Na we arabasubiza ati “Nintabona inkovu z’imbereri mu biganza bye ngo nzishyiremo urutoki rwanjye, sinshyire n’ikiganza cyanjye mu rubavu rwe sinzemera.”
yohana:20:26: Yesu yongera kwiyereka abigishwa be Toma ahari26.Nuko iminsi munani ishize, abigishwa bongera guterana mu nzu nka mbere na Toma ari kumwe na bo. Yesu araza abahagarara hagati, kandi inzugi zari zigikinze arababwira ati “Amahoro abe muri mwe.”
yohana:20:27: 27.Maze abwira Toma ati “Zana hano urutoki rwawe urebe ibiganza byanjye, kandi uzane n’ikiganza cyawe ugishyire mu rubavu rwanjye, kandi we kuba utizera ahubwo ube uwizeye.”
yohana:20:28: 28.Toma aramusubiza ati “Mwami wanjye! Kandi Mana yanjye!”
yohana:20:29: 29.Yesu aramubwira ati “Wijejwe n’uko umbonye, hahirwa abizeye batambonye.”
yohana:20:30: 30.Hariho n’ibindi bimenyetso byinshi Yesu yakoreye imbere y’abigishwa, bitanditswe muri iki gitabo.
yohana:20:31: 31.Ariko ibi byandikiwe kugira ngo mwizere yuko Yesu ari Kristo Umwana w’Imana, kandi ngo nimwizera muherwa ubugingo mu izina rye.
yohana:21:1: Yesu yiyereka abigishwa be ku Nyanja ya Tiberiya1.Hanyuma y’ibyo Yesu yongera kwiyereka abigishwa be ku Nyanja ya Tiberiya, yiyerekana atya:
yohana:21:2: 2.Simoni Petero na Toma witwa Didumo, na Natanayeli w’i Kana y’i Galilaya, na bene Zebedayo n’abandi bigishwa babiri bari bari kumwe.
yohana:21:3: 3.Nuko Simoni Petero arababwira ati “Ngiye kuroba.” Baramubwira bati “Natwe turajyana nawe.” Barahaguruka bikira mu bwato, ariko bakesha iryo joro ari nta cyo bafashe.
yohana:21:4: 4.Umuseke umaze gutambika Yesu ahagarara mu kibaya cy’inyanja, ariko abigishwa ntibamenya ko ari we.
yohana:21:5: 5.Yesu arababaza ati “Yemwe bana banjye, mufite icyo kurya?” Baramusubiza bati “Nta cyo.”
yohana:21:6: 6.Arababwira ati “Nimujugunye urushundura iburyo bw’ubwato, murafata.” Nuko bararujugunya ntibaba bakibasha kurukurura, kuko ifi zari nyinshi.
yohana:21:7: 7.Wa mwigishwa Yesu yakundaga abwira Petero ati “Ni Umwami Yesu.” Nuko Simoni Petero yumvise ko ari Umwami, akenyera umwenda kuko yari yambaye ubusa, yiroha mu nyanja.
yohana:21:8: 8.Ariko abandi bigishwa baza mu bwato, bakurura urushundura rurimo ifi kuko batari kure y’inkombe, ahubwo hari nka mikono magana abiri.
yohana:21:9: 9.Bomotse imusozi babona umuriro w’amakara, n’ifi zokejeho n’umutsima.
yohana:21:10: 10.Yesu arababwira ati “Nimuzane ku ifi mumaze gufata.”
yohana:21:11: 11.Simoni Petero yikira mu bwato, akururira urushundura imusozi rwuzuye ifi nini ijana na mirongo itanu n’eshatu, ariko nubwo zari nyinshi zityo urushundura ntirwacitse.
yohana:21:12: 12.Yesu arababwira ati “Nimuze murye.” Ntihagira n’umwe wo muri abo bigishwa be utinyuka kumubaza ati “Uri nde?” Kuko bari bazi ko ari Umwami.
yohana:21:13: 13.Yesu araza yenda umutsima arawubaha, n’ifi na zo azigenza atyo.
yohana:21:14: 14.Ubwo ni ubwa gatatu Yesu abonekera abigishwa be, amaze kuzuka.
yohana:21:15: Yesu abaza Petero gatatu ko amukunda15.Nuko bamaze kurya Yesu abaza Simoni Petero ati “Simoni mwene Yona, urusha aba kunkunda?” Aramusubiza ati “Yee, Mwami, uzi ko ngukunda.” Aramubwira ati “Ragira abana b’intama banjye.”
yohana:21:16: 16.Yongera kumubaza ubwa kabiri ati “Simoni mwene Yona, urankunda?” Aramusubiza ati “Yee, Mwami, uzi ko ngukunda.” Aramubwira ati “Ragira intama zanjye.”
yohana:21:17: 17.Amubaza ubwa gatatu ati “Simoni mwene Yona, urankunda?” Petero ababazwa n’uko amubajije ubwa gatatu ati “Urankunda?” Nuko aramusubiza ati “Mwami, umenya byose, uzi kandi ko ngukunda.” Yesu aramubwira ati “Ragira intama zanjye.
yohana:21:18: 18.Ni ukuri, ni ukuri, ndakubwira yuko ukiri umusore wikenyezaga ukajya aho ushaka hose, ariko nusaza uzarambura amaboko undi agukenyeze, akujyane aho udashaka.”
yohana:21:19: 19.Icyatumye avuga atyo ni ukwerekana urupfu azubahisha Imana. Amaze kuvuga atyo aramubwira ati “Nkurikira.”
yohana:21:20: 20.Petero arakebuka, abona umwigishwa Yesu yakundaga na we abakurikiye, ari we wari wariseguye igituza cya Yesu basangira nijoro akamubaza ati “Databuja, ni nde ugiye kukugambanira?”
yohana:21:21: 21.Petero abonye uwo abaza Yesu ati “Mwami, uyu se azamera ate?”
yohana:21:22: 22.Yesu aramusubiza ati “Niba nshaka ko agumaho kugeza aho nzazira, upfa iki? Nkurikira.”
yohana:21:23: 23.Ni cyo cyatumye iryo jambo ryamamara muri bene Data ngo uwo mwigishwa ntazapfa. Ariko Yesu ntiyabwiye Petero yuko uwo atazapfa, ahubwo yaramubwiye ngo “Niba nshaka ko agumaho kugeza aho nzazira, upfa iki?”
yohana:21:24: 24.Uyu ni we wa mwigishwa uhamya ibyo, ni na we wabyanditse kandi tuzi yuko ibyo ahamya ari iby’ukuri.
yohana:21:25: 25.Ariko hariho n’ibindi byinshi Yesu yakoze, byakwandikwa byose ngira ngo ibitabo byakwandikwa ntibyakwirwa mu isi.
